results.name: Odd bisection of A257244: a(n) = A257244(2n - 1).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2048
formula: a(n) = A006530(A256393(2n - 1)). [Equally, the largest prime factor of A256393(2n-1).]
xref: Cf. also A257246 (the other bisection), A257247 (gives the positions where both bisections have the same value).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Apr 19 2015
